headline: Amaze Extends Partnership with Adobe Express, Expands Platform Access to Creators in India
summary: Next phase of collaboration broadens access to integration e-commerce and design tools for global creatorsNEWPORT BEACH, Calif., Nov. 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Amaze Holdings, Inc. (NYSE American: AMZE) (“Amaze”) a global leader in creator-powered commerce, today announced an extension to its partnership with Adobe Express, the quick and easy create-anything app. This phase of the partnership extends access to India, a country with over 2 million monetized content creators and $350 billion in
